text: Crystal River may refer to the following places in the United States of America: *Crystal River, Florida, a small city in Florida *Crystal River (Florida), a river near the small city of the same name *Crystal River (Colorado), a tributary of the Roaring Fork River in Colorado *Crystal River (Michigan), a stream located in northern Michigan's Lower Peninsula *Crystal River 3 Nuclear Generating Station in Florida *Crystal River Energy Complex in Florida *Crystal River, a river and tributary of the Tomorrow/Waupaca River, in Central Wisconsin
title: Crystal River
